name: Forrest Run
description:
MoJam 2018 submission. (Theme = Truth or Dare). 

A relaxed game about timing and reactions. Press A and D to move left and right. Press Spacebar to open doors (when you reach the gold steps). Open a door when its handle is gold, otherwise there will be spikes to avoid! (You must choose the real door, the true door, or else you will have to dare to take on some dangerous obstacles). You will also hear the music fade and become distant, if you open the incorrect door.

Some of the ambient sound effects were taken from freesound.org. Various textures were taken from google images. Otherwise, all coding, art, music and sound design by Sean Soraghan. The main music track was recorded prior to MoJam. Some of the ambient sound was recorded prior to MoJam, at various locations around the world, including Greece, England, and Canada (Quebec).
